content: The form has been fully completed by all roles and is now finalized. It is available in view-only mode.

comment.text: The translation key "FormVDRCompletedDescription" is used to display a message when a form has been fully completed and finalized in view-only mode. This text appears on-screen when users access a completed form. Translators should provide a neutral or positive tone that aligns with the application's UI language.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'view-only mode' is not accurately conveyed by 'yalnız ekran rejimində mövcuddur.' A more suitable translation would be something along the lines of 'yalnız baxış rejimi' or 'yalnız oxuma rejimi'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Forma bütün rollar tərəfindən tamamilə dolduruldu və indi son formadadır. Yalnız baxış rejimi/oxuma rejimi ilə mövcuddur.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "բոլոր դերերով" (by all roles) is not the most natural or accurate translation of "by all roles". It implies the roles themselves filled out the form, which isn't the intended meaning. It should convey that the form was completed *with the involvement* of all roles.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ձևաթուղթը լրացվել է բոլոր դերերի մասնակցությամբ:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not drastically wrong, "վերջնականացված է" (finalized) is a bit formal and verbose for this context.  A more conversational and concise alternative would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ձևաթուղթը վերջնական է:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: There is an unnecessary colon after "վերջնականացված է" and before "Այն հասանելի է".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ձևաթուղթը վերջնական է: Այն հասանելի է միայն դիտելու ռեժիմում:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "閲覧専用モードで利用可能です" (ronbō-genjō mōdo de riyō kanō desu) literally translates to 'available for use in view-only mode'. While understandable, a more natural and concise translation of 'available in view-only mode' would be something like "閲覧専用モードで確認できます" (ronbō-genjō mōdo de kakunin dekimasu) or "閲覧専用モードでご覧いただけます" (ronbō-genjō mōdo de goran itadakemasu).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 閲覧専用モードで確認できます (ronbō-genjō mōdo de kakunin dekimasu) or 閲覧専用モードでご覧いただけます (ronbō-genjō mōdo de goran itadakemasu)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "모든 역할이 양식 작성을 완료하여 마무리되었습니다" is a bit clunky and literal. A more natural Korean phrasing would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 모든 담당자가 양식을 모두 작성하여 완료되었으며, 읽기 전용 모드로 확인할 수 있습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, using "모두" (all) twice in close proximity is slightly repetitive and could be improved for flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 모든 담당자가 양식을 작성하여 완료되었으며, 읽기 전용 모드로 확인할 수 있습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ຮອບດ້ານ" (rop dan) in "ແບບຟອມຖືກເຮັດສໍາເລັດຮອບດ້ານໂດຍບຸກຄົນທຸກຄົນ" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "fully completed." It translates closer to "thoroughly" or "comprehensively."  A better translation for 'fully' would be something like 'ຢ່າງເຕັມທີ່' (yang tem thi).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ແບບຟອມຖືກເຮັດສໍາເລັດຢ່າງເຕັມທີ່ໂດຍບຸກຄົນທຸກຄົນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ສ້າງສໍາເລັດແລ້ວ' (sang sad lerd lao) is redundant when combined with 'ຖືກເຮັດສໍາເລັດ'. It can be shortened to just 'ຖືກເຮັດສໍາເລັດແລ້ວ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ມັນຖືກເຮັດສໍາເລັດແລ້ວ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'is now finalized' is not accurately reflected in the Latvian translation. 'Pabeigta' implies completion but not necessarily finalization in a formal sense. A better translation would convey the idea of 'finalized' or 'approved'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Visas lomas ir pilnībā aizpildījušas veidlapu, un tagad tā ir pabeigta un apstiprināta. Tā ir pieejama tikai skatīšanas režīmā.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'finalizowany' (being finalized) suggests an ongoing process. 'Finalized' implies a completed state, which aligns better with the English 'finalized'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Formularz został w pełni ukończony przez wszystkie role i jest teraz zakończony. Jest dostępny w trybie tylko do odczytu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'all roles' is translated as 'todas as funções'. While technically correct, it sounds unnatural in Portuguese. A better translation would emphasize who completed the form.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: O formulário foi totalmente preenchido por todos os envolvidos e está agora finalizado.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better flow. Splitting the sentence might enhance readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: O formulário foi totalmente preenchido por todos os envolvidos e está agora finalizado. Ele está disponível no modo de visualização.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "toți utilizatorii cu toate rolurile" (all users with all roles) is redundant and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'all roles' in the English sentence. It implies every user has every role, which is unlikely.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Formularul a fost completat integral de toți cei cu roluri atribuite și acum este finalizat.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "disponibil numai cu vizualizare" is an awkward and not idiomatic way to say 'view-only mode'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Este disponibil în modul vizualizare doar.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "во всех ролях" (in all roles) is slightly awkward and doesn't perfectly capture the nuance of 'by all roles' in the English original. It implies the form was completed *from* all roles, rather than completed *by* people holding each role.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Форма полностью заполнена всеми участниками, выполняющими различные роли, и завершена.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, it might be more natural to rephrase the sentence structure slightly to improve readability. The original phrasing is a bit long.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Форма полностью заполнена всеми участниками и завершена. Она доступна только для просмотра.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පෝරමය' (poramaya) should be 'ආකෘතිය' (akruththi) for a more accurate translation of 'form'. 'පෝරමය' is more commonly used for a document being sent or received, not necessarily a filled-out form.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ආකෘතිය

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'සියලුම භූමිකාවන් විසින් සම්පුර්ණ කර ඇති අතර' (siyalluma bhumikawan vashiyan sampurna kara athi athara) is slightly awkward. It could be rephrased for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සියලුම භූමිකාවන් විසින් සම්පූර්ණ කරන ලද

ai_spell_check_issues.description: 'Finalized' is better conveyed as 'අවසන්' (avasan) or 'අවසාත්මක' (avasathmak) instead of simply 'අවසන් කර ඇත'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: අවසන් වී ඇත

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation lacks a more natural flow and could benefit from re-structuring the sentence for readability. It currently sounds a bit literal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ආකෘතිය සියලුම භූමිකාවන් විසින් සම්පූර්ණ කරන ලද අතර, දැන් අවසන් වී ඇත. එය බැලීම-පමණක් ආකාරයෙන් ලබා ගත හැකිය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "available in view-only mode" is not accurately reflected in the Slovak translation. "Je prístupný len v režime zobrazenia" translates more literally to 'It is accessible only in viewing mode.' While understandable, it doesn't convey the same nuance of being finalized and restricted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Formulár je teraz len na čítanie.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "za vse vloge" (for all roles) is slightly awkward and doesn't perfectly capture the nuance of "by all roles" in the English original. It implies the form is *intended* for all roles, not that all roles *completed* it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Obrazec je v celoti izpolnjen od vseh vpletenih oseb in je zdaj dokončan.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Obrazac je u potpunosti popunjen od strane svih uloga i sada je dostupan samo za pregled' is a literal translation that doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'roles' and 'finalized'. 'Roles' implies specific individuals or positions contributing to the form. 'Finalized' suggests a definitive state of completion. A more natural and accurate translation is needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Obrazac je u potpunosti ispunjen od strane svih uključenih lica i sada je završen i dostupan samo za pregled.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'uključenih' is used instead of 'popunjen' to describe the form being filled. While 'popunjen' is acceptable, 'uključenih' (involved) might be more appropriate depending on context, as it implies the roles actively participated.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change required - 'uključenih' is a valid alternative.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'sonlandırıldı' (terminated/ended) doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'finalized' in this context. 'Finalize' implies completion and readiness for review, not necessarily an ending process.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Form, tüm roller tarafından tamamen dolduruldu ve nihai hale getirildi. Salt görüntüleme modunda kullanılabilir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not a critical error, the sentence structure is a bit clunky. A smoother flow would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Form, tüm roller tarafından tamamlandı ve nihai hale getirildi. Şimdi salt görüntüleme modunda mevcut.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "is now finalized" is not accurately conveyed by "й готова." "Готова" implies readiness but lacks the finality conveyed by 'finalized'. A more accurate translation would convey the sense of being officially concluded or approved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Форма повністю заповнена всіма ролями та затверджена. Вона доступна лише для перегляду.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'khóa' (locked) doesn't quite convey the meaning of 'finalized'. 'Finalized' implies completion and a definitive state, not necessarily that it's locked or inaccessible for editing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Biểu mẫu đã được tất cả các vai trò điền đầy đủ và hiện đã hoàn tất. Nó ở chế độ chỉ xem.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the repetition of 'Nó' is slightly awkward. It could be rephrased for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Biểu mẫu đã được tất cả các vai trò điền đầy đủ và hiện đã hoàn tất. Nó đang ở chế độ chỉ xem.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "所有角色的用户已填写完表单" is not the most natural way to express 'The form has been fully completed by all roles'. A more accurate and natural translation would emphasize that *the form itself* is complete, not just the users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 表单已由所有角色填写完毕

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “最终化” doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'finalized' in this context. It suggests a process of making something final, rather than the state of being final.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 已完成最终确认

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly an error, separating the two clauses with a comma and conjunction (如：并且) would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 表单已由所有角色填写完毕，并且以只读模式提供。
